entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
